description: The updated St Elias FG GTX skips the break-in period and delivers all-day comfort with the first wear. Straight out of the box and onto the trail, the midsole and outsole systems provide athletic flexibility and foot comfort for long distance hikes. A waterproof nubuck leather upper and GORE-TEX membrane stand up to the rigors of backpacking and ensure peace of mind in wet conditions.
name: Vasque St Elias FG GTX, Medium - Mens
